content.question: A patient was admitted to the ICU in December 2000 with an uncharacterized bacterial infection. Based on the data from the study, identify the following. The antibiotic that was most likely to be effective for treating the infection The antibiotic that was least likely to be effective for treating the infection

frqParts.text: A patient was admitted to the ICU in December 2000 with an uncharacterized bacterial infection. Based on the data from the study, identify the following. The antibiotic that was most likely to be effective for treating the infection The antibiotic that was least likely to be effective for treating the infection

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
